Package stage

Class SimulatorConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • stage.SimulatorConfiguration

  • public class SimulatorConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    This class pretends to deliver some constants already defined to change the behaviors of the Simulator which happens to execute a simulation of a series of horse races with a set of pairs Horse/Jockey, a set of Spectators and a Broker.
    Since:
    1.0.1b
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Hugo Fragata, Rui Lopes

      Maximum amount of money a Spectator could have.

      Number of Pairs Horse/Jockey to compete on the simulation.
